EmailTemplate.description: Enviar cuando ya fue aprobado el TKD en el Tollgate 2 a Tesoreria
EmailTemplate.name: TKD_Tollgate_2_Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" in stage Tollgate 2 has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} Tollgate 2 stage has been approved and changed to Registry stage.
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engen Capital.
